transcript: reputation is the best thing that you can have if you have given enough to people you will already have earned their trust so that you don't need to sell they will just say I want to work with you and you just accept it and you say sure the give give first until they ask is the long-term strategy that compounds unto itself because your business will compound as a result of the Goodwill that compounds in the marketplace whereas if you have a sales driven Org the only way that that business compounds is if the sales guys compounding their recruiting on your behalf rather than because if they have a great product they have a great sales system
